description: Shopee Open Platform is a go-to source of Open APIs and services created to support developers serving Shopee sellers with different ecommerce needs.
notes:
This appears to be an introduction/overview page of the Shopee Open Platform documentation. Key information extracted:

1. Language Support: English, 简体中文, 繁體中文, Português, ไทย

2. Main Features:
- Powerful APIs for orders, products, marketing
- Push notification services
- Comprehensive developer services
- API testing tools
- Sandbox testing environments

3. Two types of users:
- Software service providers
- Sellers with software development capabilities

No specific API endpoints or parameters are shown on this page as it's an overview/introduction page.
